remarks: The unit subspace (all vectors) is closed.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dochoc1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochoc1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochoc1.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochoc1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochoc1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochoc1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` V ) ) = V ) $.
